name: Penfield AI Inc.
description: Developer of a cybersecurity platform designed to enhance security operations through process automation and performance optimization. The company's platform equips security teams with AI-powered tools for process standardization, bottleneck analysis and personalized automation, enabling clients to streamline workflows, optimize performance and elevate overall security posture.
